channel.title: Introduction, FAQ on Gerald's Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction, FAQ on Gerald's Journal

item.title: Introduction
item.description:
Welcome to Gray’s Notes.

I have a little note to drop proceeding the creation of this site. You are about to behold, sacred content - carved from the most reliable resources on the planet and my brain of course. Peril to thee, who assumes this blog is subjected to computers alone. It is a piece of entertainment to the fanatics of computers, but also a platform of expression, research, ideologies and beliefs spanning through several fields of science, technology, engineering, faith and poetry!
